column1: full, just outside off stump, and with two slips in pace. Left alone as the ball jags away, but interestingly the ball doesn't carry to Carey
full, on middle, and he covers his off stump to block towards the non-striker
first runs! Full, outside off, and he opens the bat's face to find the gap through the point region. Two men give it a chase
full, on off, and the ball's coming inwards. Defended with the straight bat to mid on
length ball, just outside off, and defended off the back foot to mid-off
length ball, just outside off, and he tiptoes to flick towards mid-on
banged in short and aimed at the body of Dhawan, 138ks, cramps the batsman for room. Fended off to the leg side for one
good length and skipping away with the angle outside off, no shot from Rohit

Dropped by Coulter-Nile diving to his right from short midwicket. The ball bursts out of his hands. Coulter-Nile throws himself to his right and attempts the catch with his right hand - but it does not stick. Rohit has a life. Very full on the pads, chipped in the air and Rohit gets away
tapped towards wide mid-on for a single and Rohit gets off strike
very full and darting into the pads, Starc cranks up to 144ks, but no swing for him yet. Tucked away towards square leg off the back foot
back of a length and on the hips of Rohit, 143ks, he can't put it away
length ball, on leg stump, and Dhawan prods forward to fend
length ball, on middle and angling across. Dhawan looks to defend, but the ball takes his outside edge. Dribbles past the slip cordon, but third man is there to clean up
length ball, just outside off, and he tiptoes to flick to midwicket
length ball outside off, and a nice sound off his bat as he crunches a square cut. Finds Maxi at point
full, just outside off and he tries to drive. But the ball moves away, takes the outside edge and down to third man
length ball, on middle, and tapped to the off side. Dhawan wants the single, but Rohit says no. Wise choice
back of a length on middle, and he rides the bounce to block off the backfoot
fullish, angling away, and he opens the bat's face to play a late cut to third man
goes short on off, and Dhawan does well to bend his knees to sway away from the ball's line
fuller, nearly a yorker on off, and he digs this into his boots. Dhawan wants the single, but Starc is quick to pounce on it
length ball, outside off, and he flays a square cut behind point. But another excellent effort from Maxwell at point, parrying it to third man and ensuring the ball doesn't go for four
tries to hook but the ball isn't short enough. Length ball on leg, and Rohit already lifted his front leg to play behind square, but the ball hits his body instead
full, on leg, and he uses his wrists to play this off his hips to midwicket. Finch gives it a chase to the boundary
length ball, on middle, and Dhawan has no choice but to defend off his backfoot to the leg side
peach! Full, on middle, and Dhawan prods forward to flick to deep midwicket but the ball moves oh-so-slightly away and whizzes past his outside edge
back of a length, on middle, and uncomfortably blocked by Dhawan. Gloves it towards the slip region
caressed! Full, outside off, and he meets the ball on the front foot, driving through the covers for four
length ball, on the leg-stump line, and nudged to the gap behind square on the leg side for a quick run
full, on middle and angling into his pads. Tries to give this a whip over the leg side, but the ball hits his pads instead
length, on leg, and clipped off his pads to the big gap on the leg side. Zampa from fine leg runs across to intercept
full, on leg and swinging into his pads. Flicked to midwicket, and stopped by the fielder diving to his right
length ball, on middle, and he allows the bat's straight face to check-punch towards the off side
full, on off. Searching for the inswinger but the ball holds it's line. Driven to mid-off
length ball, outside off, and cut off the back foot. Finds Maxwell at point again
length ball, on middle, and angling across. Dhawan skips backwards and punches with the bat's open face to cover
length ball, on middle, and nudged off his pads to the leg side
full, on middle, and defended off the back foot to the off side. Fielder from cover comes sweeping in to stop the single

searing pace! Back of a length on leg, and Dhawan swivels to pull, but the ball flies just past his gloves to Carey. Finch wants to review, but Carey convinces him not to. Good call, there was no touch
flicked to midwicket firmly for a single
length ball on the fourth-stump line outside off. Rohit defends with soft hands to the off side
length-ish, on middle. Dhawan check-drives to cover
full, on off, and Dhawan walks across to the off side, exposing his leg-stump partly, but he ends up too close to the ball. Plays a square-drive, with minimal power, to cover point
aggressive! Length ball on middle, and Dhawan skips down the ground to muscle a straight drive through Rohit's legs for four
wayward! Tries to bowl the offcutter, but it lands way beyond leg stump and goes through to the keeper
short and wide and punished off the back foot. Drills a square cut to the boundary, and looks like Dhawan is now ready to tee off
precision! Length ball, angling away, and simply guides a cut past point and inbefore third man
slower ball, on middle, and Dhawan uses his wrists to open the bat's face and steer a square cut past the diving point fielder. A touch of finesse there
hits him near the shoulder! Back of a length, and the ball rises quickly. Dhawan tries to pull, but the ball hurries onto him. A real skidder
length ball, on leg, and he works this off his hips to square leg
length ball, on off, and Rohit closes his bat's face to guide a flick to midwicket
length ball, on off, and Dhawan walks across to the off side to block. Ball goes off his outside edge to point
fullish, 139kph, and he flicks this with gentle hands to the fielder at deep midwicket. Removes his bottom hand while playing that shot. Is the finger bothering him?
length ball, on middle, and fended off the back foot to the bowler
length ball, on leg stump, and Dhawan defends off the back foot. Once again takes his bottom-hand off his handle
length ball, on middle, and Dhawan backs away to guide a late cut to third man. Preferring to play shots that use the bowler's pace instead of generating his own
length ball, rising delivery but Rohit punches this from chest-high to cover
length ball, on middle, and he backs away to cut. Finds point. A pack off-side field
length ball outside leg stump, and Dhawan makes room - exposing all three stumps - to cut. The shot is played beyond leg stump! Crazy
length ball, on middle, and guided to point off the back foot
slides on with the arm outside off, Rohit plays for some turn, but is beaten on the outside edge
this full one breaks into the pads of Rohit, who puts it away to deep square leg. A twirl of the wrists gives him a single
skids in from round the wicket, fractionally short, Dhawan jumps back and secures a single to the covers
short and spins back in, cramps him, fended off with the break
fuller on middle and leg, worked away with the spin to square leg
slider on middle, Dhawan jabs his bat down on it and keeps it out
oh dear, way too short on leg, and Rohit waits for the ball to come to him before slogging hell-for-leather behind square on the leg-side for four
too full this time, a full toss on leg stump, and flicked to deep midwicket

length ball, on off, and he waits for the ball to come to him, before playing a late cut past short third man. Good effort from the fielder trying to get the ball back in, but the ball runs away for four anyway
full, on leg stump. Drilled to midwicket
full, outside off, and he comes forward to drive. Struck to mid-off
full, on off, and driven down the ground to long off

overpitched and outside off, slower from Maxwell, Rohit allows the ball to come onto the bat. Then opens the face and eases it away wide of point. Zampa chases it hard, slides, but the ball wins the race. Top shot, opened the face and pierced the gap between point and third man like a boss
short and slides in on middle, punched off the back foot to the bowler
fuller and turns in as Rohit taps it away behind square on the leg side
short and slides in from around the stumps, punched with the angle to wide long-on
arm ball from Maxwell, Rohit goes on the back foot and solidly punches the ball through the covers
nudged off the pads but straight to short fine leg
pretty full on middle, but not quite driveable length, pushed down to long-on
tossed up on middle, spins in, Dhawan hits it towards deep midwicket
Rohit uses his feet, takes a middle-stump full-toss and punches down to long-on
Dhawan dashes down the track and drills a full ball from outside off to long-off
dragged down on leg stump, Rohit drops down to one knee and sweeps flat and hard to deep backward square leg
looped up and wide outside off, Rohit stretches out and drives to sweeper cover
dug in short on off, run away towards point off the back foot
full on middle and leg, flicked away to square leg
hammered in short and angling across off, the steep bounce catches Dhawan unawares. He looks away, takes his eyes off the ball, and top-edges a hook and gets a four wide of fine leg
short and angling across off, knocked down to third man with an open face
back of a length and outside off, glided away towards backward point
short and outside off, gets on top of the bounce and rides it to point
banged in short and outside off, Dhawan leaps, gets under it, and ramps it over the keeper's head, drawing applause from Kohli. Third man is squarer as opposed to finer
shorter and outside off, helped to point off the back foot
might have been a cross-seamer, holds in the pitch and bounces, skewed away behind point to third man
very full and outside off, punched to mid-on
hip-high short ball on middle, Rohit swivels on the back foot and middles a pull to deep square leg
pitched up and just a shade outside off, Dhawan drives on the up but can't beat extra-cover, and that's drinks
dug in short and outside off, angling in towards the left shoulder of Rohit. He jumps back and pulls in the air to the right of deep square leg for a maximum
back of a length and outside off, punched to mid-off
Rohit rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and dinks it down to third man
short at the body, tucked to the leg side for one
short and on off, this slower ball is defended off the back foot
tip and run to the left of short cover. Dhawan and Rohit take on Smith's arm and complete the single
slower offcutter, finishes on off, Rohit presses forward and defensively drops the ball to the leg side
thigh-high short ball on the leg stump, Rohit keeps back and swats a pull away to deep fine leg
Dhawan jumps across off, gets closer to this full ball outside off and punches with an open face behind point, to the right of sweeper
full-toss on leg and middle, bunted to mid-off and Rohit responds swiftly enough for a single. Dhawan celebrates his half-century, plenty of smiles in the Indian dressing room
back of a length and angling in, turned with the incoming angle behind square on the leg side for a single
Dhawan races down the track. Short and wide outside off, Dhawan reaches out for the ball and smears it away to sweper cover
dug in short on off, Dhawan leaps and fends it to point with soft hands
back of a length and angling across off, fended behind to the keeper
back of a length and too straight, tucked to deep midwicket
short on middle, Dhawan hops and fends to point
short on the hips, 140ks, worked behind square on the leg side
slower cutter on leg stump, tucked around the corner as Rohit and Dhawan bring up another century opening stand
good length on middle, defended to the leg side
Rohit leans back and cuts a short ball from outside off to backward point, where Maxwell dives, fumbles, and gives up a single
dug in short and aimed at the shoulder of Dhawan, he swivels on the back foot and pulls to the fine leg boundary
Wow, this is a stunning stroke from Dhawan. Pitched up and outside off, Dhawan stretches out and shovels it away with the bottom hand over extra-cover. Skims away to the fence. Shot of the day so far
pitched up and outside off, driven through the line to sweeper cover
short, wide, Rohit rocks back and nails a cut to the point boundary. Rohit joins Dhawan in getting to a fifty
on a length and angling across off, punched away to the right of sweeper cover
on the pads, clipped away wide of midwicket. Rohit hares back for the second
short and outside of, Rohit jumps on top of the ball and crunches to sweeper
yorker on leg stump, jabbed away to deep midwicket
length ball, outside off, and bends his knees to get his eyes on the ball's level. Cuts past point, but the fielder in the deep - Coulter-Nile - slides across the ground to stop the boundary
length ball, on middle, and flicked off his pads to deep midwicket
zipping into Rohit, and he pulls this off the back foot to deep midwicket
length ball, on leg, and the googly is punched off the back foot to the bowler
full, on middle, and nudged off his toes to deep midwicket for a walking single
full, outside off, and pushed with the bat's open face to deep extra cover
full, on off, and flicked off his toes to midwicket. Soft hands
first wicket! Length ball outside off, rising off the deck, and Rohit tries fishing for it. Takes the outside edge, and Carey moves swiftly to his left right to half-dive and complete the catch
full outside off, and left alone
full, on his pads, and worked to the leg side
length ball, wide outside off again, and Kohli is happy to let it go
full, on middle, and skidding through. Dhawan comes down the wicket and lifts it over Zampa. Could've been out to long-off it he hadn't hit it that straight
full, on off and the googly is met by Kohli on the front foot. Tapped towards the leg side
full outside off, and he drives the legbreak to extra cover
length ball on middle, and the googly spins wildly away. Dhawan goes onto the back foot and punches to long off
overpitched on middle, nearly a yorker. Dug away to mid on

length ball, on leg, and he tries to flick square. Ball hits some part of Dhawan and flies down the leg side, but Carey jumps to his right to take a one-handed catches. Will Australia review? Nah, that came off his hip
full, on middle, and driven confidently away from his body to extra cover
back of a length outside off, rolling his fingers over this ball. Punched to cover after tiptoeing
length ball, on middle and angling away. Guided off the back foot to point
length ball, on off, and he caresses a back-foot punch to mid-off
length ball, wide outside off, and cut square off the back foot to deep point
full, outside off, and defended to mid off
too wide outside off, forcing Virat to reach. He slaps a square drive to Cummins at deep extra cover
full, outside off, and Dhawan takes a huge stride to meet the ball. Hammers a square drive in front of the fielder at cover, and the ball has raced away to the fence
length ball, on middle, and flicked to the leg side
full outside off stump, and he opens the bat's face to guide a shot to deep point
full, on middle, and he skips down the wicket to lift a shot over mid-on. Nonchalantly done, races away to the wide long-on boundary
length ball, outside off, and he flays a shot to cover. Mistimed
full, on off, and he drives off the front foot to mid-on
length ball, on middle, and angling down leg. Virat is furious at himself for missing out on a pull
slapped over point! Full, very wide outside off, and Virat's fast hands sends the ball over point. Third man not quick enough
length ball, outside off, and punched square to deep point
back of a length on middle, and a bit of spongy bounce takes the ball over Dhawan's blade while he tries to ramp it over Carey. Smart take from the keeper
length ball, outside off stump, and with no turn. Punched past the non-striker to mid-on
Maxwell coming around the wicket. Length ball angling in from outside off, and he plays a grounded pull shot to deep midwicket
length ball, outside off and turning in. Kohli backs away to make room, and punches down the ground to long on
full, on middle, and defended with gentle hands to Maxwell
length ball outside off, and he bends his knees to cut. Finds Smith at point though
full, on leg, and nudged away to short fine leg. Kohli scampers across to the other end, and is safe despite a solid throw
length ball, outside off, and slapped past deep extra cover. They jog back for the second
full, on off, and he mistimes a drive to mid-off. They choose not to run
back of a length, on middle, and Dhawan sways to ramp a shot over the keeper. Instead it takes the edge of his bat and flies past Carey's left instead. Moves into the nineties
length ball, on middle, and he mistimes a cut to point
length ball, outside off, and fended off the back foot to point
length ball outside off, and he prods onto the front foot for a drive. Can't beat the infield
full, on off, and angling in. Flicked to short midwicket
full, on middle, and straightening after pitching. Tapped off the front foot to cover
slow, half-tracker on middle, and Dhawan ain't missing out. Rocks deep and pulls along the ground to deep midwicket
length ball, outside off and turning inwards. Cut square to the sweeper-fielder on the off side
full, on off, and defended with soft hands to cover
full outside off, and he drives with the bat's open face. Flies off his edge and races down to third man after a misfield at point. Maxwell - at point - is disappointed with his own fielding effort
full, just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
full outside off and he throws his hands at this. Not as flawless as classical Kohli, this drive
length ball outside off, and he steers a late cut to third man
back of a length on middle, and pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
length ball, on off, and flicked off his pads to the fielder at deep midwicket. As the commentator on TV says, they've pinched eight runs off the over with zero risk
on a length and outside off, non-turner, patted into the covers for one
fuller and turns in on middle, Kohli drops it square on the leg side
Kohli stretches out and bunts a single to deep midwicket
back of a length and slides on off, poked back to the bowler
shorter and outside off, Dhawan goes on the back foot and flays the ball to sweeper
shorter and turns in on the stumps, Kohli stands up tall and forces the ball down to long-on
just short of a good length and outside off, Kohli sits back and short-arm jabs it in the air, hits it to the left of midwicket and right of mid-on. Top shot from a top batsman
shorter and outside off, pulled to the right of midwicket
might full on off, Dhawan presses forward and squirts the ball to the left of short cover

Dhawan is on 99. Dhawan is nervous. There's a mix-up between the wickets, and there's a direct hit. Kohli dishes out a full-stretch dive at the non-striker's end and is safe. Kohli and Dhawan exchange wry smiles. Then comes Dhawan's trademark celebration. He has his hands aloft, bat raised, and acknowledges the cheers. His coach Shastri is on his feet in the dressing room applauding Dhawan. Very full on off, jabbed to mid-off. Yes-no, yes-no, Dhawan somehow gets a single in the end and reaches a hundred - his sixth at an ICC ODI tournament. Only Tendulkar and Ganguly are ahead of him on this list
flapped through midwicket for one
bouncer, sails over the head, as Dhawan sways out of the way. Wide called
yorker on leg stump, jammed back to Stoinis
flatter and fuller on middle and leg, Kohli shovels it down to long-on with the bottom hand
Dhawan dashes down the track, manufactures a leg-stump half-volley and hoists it over midwicket
Dhawan backs away outside leg, fetches this full one from outside off and belts it to cover
tossed on middle, Dhawan stays leg-side of the ball. He can't get to this pitch, but still manages to collapse his back leg and loft it inside-out over extra-cover. Exquisite shot
fired on the pads, nurdled to the leg side for one
short on middle and leg from round the stumps, forced off the back foot through midwicket
short and angling across off, punched to point, where Maxwell fumbles and gives up another single
short on off, Dhawan stays leg-side of the ball and cracks it to cover
dug in short on off, Dhawan thinks about a pull but bails out at the last moment. He checks his shot and instead glides it to third man
short one again outside off, this holds up in the pitch, Dhawan ramps again over the keeper's head. Smartly done again
back of a length on off, played back to Starc
Kohli jumps across off and tucks a single to deep square leg
fullish and outside off, punchily driven down to long-off
short on leg stump, rushes Dhawan into a hook, flapped away behind square on the leg side
short and outside off, Kohli leans back and punches to point, where Maxwell swoops down on the ball this time
banged in on off, 135ks, Kohli pulls off the front foot and puts it away to the midwicket fence
shorter and outside off, swatted away in front of square on the leg side for one
short on middle, NCN seems Dhawan stepping out and digs it into the middle of the track. Dhawan swings for the hills... and misses. The ball bounces over the stumps
full and sprayed on the pads, picked away neatly to deep midwicket by Kohli
Starc just misses his yorker, overpitches it slightly on middle. Dhawan opens up his stance and hips, belting it past the bowler's outstretched left hand for four
back of a length and swerves away outside off as Dhawan stays leg-side of the ball and does not connect
short and outside off, Dhawan forces a pull to deep midwicket
short and angling across off, guided away to the left of backward point and right of deep third man

Starc misses his yorker again, goes too full on middle and leg. Dhawan ventures an almighty hoick, gets more height as opposed to distance - these are bigger boundaries anyway - and holes out to deep midwicket. End of an excellent innings nevertheless. It has put India on top
short and homing in on off, jabbed back to the bowler
back of a length and just a shade outside off, clipped away behind square

edged and dropped by Carey diving to his right. NCN has his hands on his mouth. He can't believe it. Full and nipping away against the angle, Pandya reaches out for the ball wafts, and Carey drops a fairly regulation catch
slower short ball outside off, pulled away to the left of deep midwicket
short and outside off, steered to backward point, where Maxwell throws himself to his left to stop the ball
cross-seamer outside off, stabbed through the covers
on a length and holds its line outside off, run down to deep third man
short and wide outside off, Pandya spanks it away to sweeper cover. Pinged off the middle of the bat but straight to the boundary rider
shorter and outside off, punched through the covers
chest-high short ball on middle, Kohli controls a pull and hits it to the right of deep square leg
fuller on the pads, clipped to deep square leg
shorter and outside off, run away to point with soft hands
back of a length and outside off, punched on the up to sweeper cover
NCN hits a splice-jarring length, fended away to the leg side ff the back foot
short at the hips, Pandya rocks back and smites a pull behind square on the leg side. The ball clatters away into the boundary
short and outside off, punched up to the covers this time
good length around off, defended off the front foot
hip-high short ball outside off, swatted away to deep midwicket
length ball, outside off and turning inwards. Flicked off his hips to deep midwicket
full outside off from around the wicket. Kohli presses forward to drive, but the ball goes past his outside edge. Maxwell appeals softly for caught behind, but nobody else seems interested
length ball on middle, and flicked to deep midwicket. Kohli's 50th fifty in ODIs!
glorious! Full, on off, and he goes down on one knee and slogs this over cow corner. Lands in the sea of blue
length ball outside off, and he slaps a cut to Smith at cover
length ball outside off, and cut off the back foot to deep point
superb Length ball, on off, and Kohli goes inside-out over cover. Need the action replay!
length ball, on off, and he smothers this to the leg side off his hips
back of a length on off, and he pulls along the ground to deep midwicket
full, on off stump, and he mistimes a front-foot drive to cover
slower ball, on middle, and worked off his pads to Maxwell at deep midwicket
hammered! And sends Coulter-Nile ducking. Full outside off, and he slams a straight drive over NCN's head
length ball on leg, and he nudges it to the vacant region near wide long on
full, just outside off, and driven with the turn to wide long off on this occasion
full, on middle, and he goes down on one knee to slog-sweep to deep midwicket. Googly
length ball, just outside off, and cut. Finds point
outta here! Full, on off, and he drags a slogged shot over deep square leg. That was the longer boundary at The Oval, but for Pandya, no big deal
half-tracker on middle, but skidding through quickly. He muscles a leg-side swipe to the fielder in the deep
straight over the non-striker! Full, on off, and he offers his bat's full face to earn another six. Wasn't a bad ball at all
using his katana well! Back of a length outside off, and it wasn't too wide either, but Hardik uses his fast hands to slap a cut to the deep-point boundary for nearly a six
full, on leg stump, and Pandya tries to flick fine. Gets some connection, but Carey dives to intercept

full, on off, and he closes the bat's face to drill a leg-side swipe to cow corner. Khawaja - at long on - runs to his right and dives across the ground to stop the boundary. Full marks for commitment
overpitched, too wide outside off. Pandya stretched to slap it square, but couldn't get bat on ball
back of a length on middle, and he's done in by the slower ball. Mistimes a pulled shot to the leg side
full outside off stump, and he reaches forward to drive. But he misses, perhaps because it was too wide
full outside off, and he tries to drag a leg-side swipe from beyond off stump. Takes an inside edge to square leg instead
full, wide outside off and angling further away. Kohli tries to reach at it to drive, but misses
full, on middle, and he looks to drive through the covers. But the ball takes his outside edge and nearly carries to Zampa at third man
full, on off, and he brings out the short-arm jab to deposit a beautiful looking six over wide long on. High on the whippage metre. Kohli didn't even look up to see where the ball went. He knew
length ball, slower on leg stump. Nudged into the gap at deep midwicket for a couple more
full, on middle, and he mistimes a straight drive. Beats Starc though, and therefore Kohli adds another run to his tally
overpitched, and clipped to third man
back of a length on middle, and Pandya misses the pull. Deceived by the slower-bouncer
steered! What confidence this young man possesses. It was a wide yorker, but Hardik simply opens the bat's face to guide this past backward point for four
full and wide outside off stump. And going further away
back of a length, wide outside off, and he pulls this along the ground to deep midwicket
low full toss, outside off stump ,and he slices this to cover. Excellent pinch-hitting
length ball, outside off, and punched to mid off
full outside off, and Kohli plays a stunning lofted drive over cover, and my oh my, this has gone over the boundary! Exquisite
length ball, just outside off, and tapped down the ground to the vacant mid-on region
top-edged over Carey! Back of a length on off, and Dhoni went for the pull, but couldn't get the perfect connection he wanted. Runs nonetheless
full, on off, and hit over the infield to deep extra cover
back of a length on off and angling in. He pulls this behind square to NCN at fine leg
full, on off, and dug down to wide long on. Did well to deal with a yorker-ish delivery
yorker on middle, and he tries to dig it towards the leg side. Leading edge to the off side
full and wide outside off stump. Dhoni can't reach at it, but the ball is called fine because it was inside the tramlines
full outside off, and he mistimes a drive to extra cover. Splices it
full and wide outside off. Too wide though, and this time umpire Gaffaney calls it as extras
easy peasy! Slow, angling down leg, and he steers a pulled shot to the fine-leg fence
yorker, on off, and mistimed down the ground to long off
back of a length, outside off, and steered to point
full, on leg stump, and he has deposited this over deep square leg! Uses the pace, and the angle from around the wicket, to earn half-a-dozen
back of a length on middle from around the wicket again. Dhoni swivels once more and deposits a grounded pull-shot to the backward square fence
full, on leg stump, from over the wicket. A leg-side flick takes a leading edge to Khawaja at point. Misfield allows them to take the double
full toss outside off and going further away. He tries to drive but misses
yorker, on middle, and he digs this away to cover
yorker, on off, and he drills this straight. Starc sticks his left leg out to stop it
catch of the tournament? Low full toss outside off, and Dhoni had flat-batted this straight, but Stoinis sticks his right-hand out to take a stunning reaction catch
full toss on middle, and he swipes this off his hips over deep midwicket. What a ball to receive first up
slower ball, on middle, and pulled off the back foot to deep midwicket
nearly a yorker on middle. Drilled to long on. Would've been run-out had Maxwell got the direct hit from long-on
length ball, very wide outside off stump. Wide
length ball, outside off stump, and Kohli tries to slap a cut over point. But it's not in the gap, and the person in the deep comfortably takes this catch
full toss outside off stump, and Rahul walks across nearly to the wide-line before hammering a leg-side swipe to the wide long-on fence. India finish on 352/5
full and nibbling into the pads slightly, Warner works it away towards midwicket
back of a length on middle, Bhuvneshwar hits a hard length, Warner drops the ball to the covers
on the pads, picked off to the left of square leg as Warner opens his account
pitched up on off, no swing in the air, straight lines from Bhuvneshwar. Finch responds with a straight drive and hits the stumps at the other end. Finch takes two off the ricochet
full and holds its line outside off, left alone
full and around off, defended off the front foot

Warner drags it back onto the stumps, but the bails refuse to budge. Clatters into the base of leg stump via a deflection off the boot, but the bails stay put. Banged in short and angling across off, Warner can't get on top of it. He fiddles with it and inside-edges it back onto the stumps. How many times has this happened in this World Cup?
back of a length and outside off, slashed away to point
pitched up and angling across off, overpitched in fact, Warner loves it there. Drilled through the covers
back of a length on middle, tipped to the covers
good length and angling away, run away towards point, where Jadeja swoops down on the ball. He's subbing for Dhawan
back of a length and holds its line outside off, diffused to the covers
full on the stumps, defended
good length and skipping away with the angle from over the wicket, Warner feels for the ball and is beaten emphatically
good length on off, tip and run to the covers
back of a length on middle, defended to cover once again
back of a length and outside off, Warner skews it away only as far as cover
fuller and running away outside off, left alone
just short of a length and outside off, punched on the up to mid-off
very full and swerving into the pads, Finch can't put it away with a flick
wide of the crease, sharply angling into middle and leg, nurdled away through square leg with soft hands
too full and angling into the pads, stylishly dispatched to the midwicket boundary by Finch. Whipped away
shorter and outside off, fended off to the off side
back of a length, angling in and straightening late to take the outside edge and roll down to deep third man
back of a length and angling in at the top of off, Finch gets on top of the bounce and crisply punches the ball to point
on a length and nipping in at off stump, Finch simply plays it back to the bowler
very full and slanting down the leg side for a wide
fullish and just a shade outside off, guided towards point
shorter on middle and leg, Finch jumps and fends it away to the leg side
fuller and angling in on middle, blocked back to Bhuvneshwar
Finch gets on top of a short ball outside off and punches nicely to the covers, where Rohit makes a tumbling save
dug in on off, swatted away to the left of Bumrah to mid-on
fuller and bending away outside off, Warner exercises caution and shoulders arms
shorter and wider, the angle takes it away further, Warner responds with a jabbing punch but can't quite pierce the packed off-side ring
back of a length and attacking off stump, Warner hops and blocks it onto the pitch
short on off, fended off once again
pitched up and Bumrah explores the channel outside off, Warner doesn't, and that's a maiden for Bumrah
shortish and outside off, forced away to cover-point region
on a length, pitches on middle, and angling away, guided off the face to point
back of a length and angling across off, punched away to point again
full and wide outside off, zips through to the keeper, as Warner flashes and collects fresh air. Might have been an offcutter
fuller offcutter outside off, no shot from Warner

back of a length and angling across off, inside-edged onto the pad. The ball trickles away to short cover, where Kohli swoops down on the ball, but can't capitalise on nervy running as he misses a direct hit. Had he nailed the stumps, Finch would have been out
short on middle, 132ks, blocked to the leg side
shorter but too close to the body for a cut, Finch winds up chopping it away to point
short at the body, Finch is cramped for room, but manages to flap it away to midwicket's right
short and angling in on middle and off, cramps Warner for room now. He hops and drops a single to point to break a sequence of dots
short at the body, tucked away towards deep square leg. Finch sprints back for the second. Chahal's throw isn't as powerful and Dhoni can't flick it onto the stumps either
lifter outside off, too high and that's a wide
back of a length and just a shade outside off, this sort of sticks in the pitch and messes with Finch's back-foot punch. The result is an inside edge that wanders away towards mid-on
short at the body, pulled away behind square on the leg side
on a length and on the pads, picked off to the left of the leg umpire
wide of the crease, angling into middle, clipped away with the angle for one
on a length and on middle, straight lines from Bhuvneshwar, no room, and blocked to cover
shorter and wide outside off, flashed away to short cover's right
Warner ventures down the track, 125ks slower ball from Bhuvneshwar, asks Warner to manufacture the pace if he can. Warner checks his shot and pushes down the ground instead
short on leg stump, Warner swivels on the back foot and pulls over short fine leg
Warner cops a nasty blow on the glove. Back of a length and bursts at the body, Warner loosens his grip and wears it on the glove. That came outta nowhere
back of a length and outside off, punched to the off side
shortish and outside off, not enough pace and bounce to trouble Finch. He nails a pull over midwicket
short and attached with plenty of width, Finch stays leg-side of the ball and flays it away between covers and point for back-to-back boundaries
short, wide, four more. Poor bowling from Pandya. There's no help from the pitch and Finch can simply hit through the line. This is biffed through extra-cover for a hat-trick of boundaries
full, on leg, nearly a yorker. Dug back to the bowler
tossed up, on leg stump, and he drives inside-out to wide long off
full, just outside off and skidding through. Cut off the back foot to point
full, on off, and Finch shovels a drive to Jadhav at wide long off this time
length ball on middle, and turning into his pads. Rocks back, and flicks to square leg
full, on middle, and Finch skips down the wicket to work it towards deep midwicket
length ball, on off, and Finch fends off the back foot to cover. They scamper across for a single
on his toes, and driven to the off side. But Warner finds cover
full, just outside off, and angling in. Warner looks to work it towards the leg side, but the ball takes an inside-edge onto his pads
back of a length, on off, and rising on Warner. Fended off the back foot
fullish, wide outside off, Pandya rolling his fingers over the ball. Tapped off the front foot with the bat's open face to point
length ball, on leg and Warner backs away to attempt a square cut. Finds point again
full, just outside off, and he goes down on one knee to slog sweep
full, on middle, and he presents the full face of the bat to drive. Straight to long on
floated, drifting and landing on a leg-stump line. Warner nudges it off his toes to the midwicket region
length ball, on off, and defended off the back foot to the off side
full, just outside off, and driven away from his body to wide long off
full, on leg stump. The legbreak turns across Warner, but before it can go too far he hammers a drive past the non-striker to long on
back of a length on off, and angling into Warner. He sways away from the ball's line, and the umpire reckons its too high. Wide given

Is Finch gone! He's walking even before the decision is given by the third umpire! This was a length ball outside off, and Warner struck it to Jadhav at deep point. He picked the ball up in a flash, and a bit of hesitation on the second run has cost the captain his wicket. Good throw from the deep, and Hardik was composed to collect the ball and break the stumps. Oh dear. Wonder who among the two batsmen called for the second run
back of a length, on middle, and Warner drops his knees to go under the ball
full, on off, and the ball takes some extra bounce when it reaches Warner. He takes one hand off his handle, and whips with soft hands to the leg side
length ball, on middle, and he cuts along the ground to Jadhav at deep point. They're happy with just the single
length ball, wide outside off, and he throws his hands at a square cut. Well struck, but finds point
length ball, on off and angling in. Uses his wrists to whip it away to deep midwicket
full, on middle and turning away from Smith. He takes a big stride forward and drives to long on
length ball, just outside off and turning away. He backs away to cut, but under-edges the shot. Very nearly took off stump
full, outside leg stump, and nudged off his pads to the leg side
full, on middle and turning in. Worked off his pads to the leg side. Big gaps there
full, on middle, and driven down the ground to mid-off
full on off and turning away. He takes a big stride forward and drives to long off
back of a length, outside off but angling in. Warner takes his eyes off the ball, but follows through with the pull, and that has raced away to the backward square boundary. Free hit
back of a length, wide outside off, and he mistimes a pull. In the air, and taken at midwicket. But Warner is safe since that was a free hit
slower-ball short delivery on middle. Warner thought that was faster than it eventually was. Swayed away too early
length ball, on off, and he punches with the bat's open face to deep point
length ball, just outside off and angling in. He works it - off his hips - to the deep backward square region
length ball on off, and angling away from Warner. Shapes up to pull, but the ball goes under his bat
length ball, on off, and he hammers a cut to deep point. Smith wanted the second, but seeing that Jadhav's at the boundary, Warner says no for the second. Drinks
full, on middle, and turning away. Tapped off the front foot to cover
fullish, just outside off, and he backs away to cut to point
full, on leg stump, and flicked to deep midwicket
length ball outside off, and he cuts this off the back foot to deep point
fullish, on Smith's toes, and he uses his bottom hand to whip a shot away to deep midwicket
legbreak first up. Lands full outside off, and turns away. Driven to wide long off
full, on off, and he whips this off his toes to deep midwicket. They take two this time
length ball outside off, and turning away. Punched towards the off side for a single
full, on off, and sliding away after pitching. Warner takes a big stride forward and pushes the ball towards the off side

full outside leg, and turning further down the leg side. Warner tried to pull, but he couldn't connect. Neither could Dhoni. Replays show that it came off Warner's gloves, so did Dhoni miss a catching opportunity?
full, outside leg, and turning down leg again. But this time Warner uses his feet to meet the ball, and drives straight down the ground
hammered! Is this the delivery that helps Warner find his timing? Length ball outside off, and with the ball turning further away, he throws his hands at it to drill a square-cut for four
full, on middle, much slower from Kuldeep. Warner comes down the wicket and taps it back to Kuldeep
length ball, on off, and turning away. He swivels, and flat-bats a shot down to long on
length ball, on middle, and Smith goes deep in his crease before working it off his waist to square leg
full, on off, and he prods forward to defend
length ball outside off, and he cuts it to deep point
full, on leg stump, and he works a leg-side swipe off his toes to deep midwicket
full, on off, and he takes a big stride forward to defend it back to the bowler
full, on off and turning away. Flicked to the leg side, off his boots, to deep midwicket
full, on off, and he drives down the ground to the vacant mid-off region. Fielder from cover comes running across to stop the ball
full, on middle, and driven to long off
full, on leg stump, and drilled to long on.
lifter outside off, flies through to the keeper, too wide, and so that's a wide
short, wide, Warner was searching for this width. Carved away to the third man boundary
back of a length and slanting in on middle, the ball keeps low. Signs of inconsistent bounce. Kept out
back of a length and skidding into middle, no room for Warner to free his arms. Guided to point
Warner, standing on leg stump, shuffles across off stump and deflects a slower variation through square leg
good length and angling in at off, defended back
Smith jumps across off, Bumrah follows him with a lifter, Smith top-edges a pull onto his body
full and turns in, Warner nurdles a single to the leg side and brings up a scrappy fifty
tossed up on off, forward and smothered
Smith shuffles across off and blocks a non-turning ball to the leg side
looped up and drifts in on off, pushed back to Chahal
short legbreak, cut off the back foot, Hardik throws himself to his left at short cover to stop the ball
tossed on the pads, clipped to short midwicket
full and sliding down the leg side for a wide
short and wide outside off, smeared straight to Chahal at short cover
tossed outside off, Smith dashes down the track, gets closer to the pitch, and launches it over midwicket
low-arm dart from Jadhav, full and outside off, Smith crouches and slog-sweeps it away between long-on and deep midwicket
banged in short and outside off, slugged away to deep square leg
short on middle, Warner hangs back and awkwardly fends it to the leg side
fullish and outside off, tapped to mid-off
nice and full on off, that might not be in the whipping radar of the other batsmen. But Smith picks it away to deep midwicket with a big whirl of the wrists
back of a length on middle, Warner stays leg-side of the ball and dabs it away towards point

back of a length on middle, pulled away to the left of deep midwicket. Rahul throws himself to his left and parries the ball away to Chahal running across from long leg. Fine tag-team effort at the boundary
pushed through on middle, down the track and clipped against the intended break to deep square leg's right
drifts into the pads, tickled away fine of short fine leg
leg-side wide
flighted and outside off, driven through the line to sweeper cover

Warner holes out to deep midwicket. Tossed up and spins in on middle, Warner uses his feet and looks to slug it over the boundary rider. He can't quite connect it well enough and finds Bhuvneshwar in the outfield. He has been put out of his misery
pushed through on middle, eased down to long-on
biting legbreak from Chahal. Starts outside off and turns in sharply, Khawaja doesn't account for the big turn and inside-edges onto the pad
full and around off, flicked to deep square leg
back of a length and angling away outside off, glided to point, where Jadeja (believe it or not) fumbles
Smith shuffles across off and knocks a single to square leg
chest-high short ball on middle, fended away to the leg side
short again, Khawaja rolls out a pull to fine leg
Smith plays around his front pad, picks a full-toss from off stump and flicks it away to fine leg. Had he missed it he would have been plumb lbw #JustSmiththings
tossed up and turns away outside off, sliced to short third man via an outside edge
flighted on middle, paddled away fine of long leg
starts outside off and turns in, Khawaja deploys a giant stride and smothers it
flatter and fired on off, tucked away through square leg
dropped short and outside off, cut to point
shorter and breaks away outside off, goes on the back foot and punches with a high elbow to sweeper
full toss on the pads, flicked to deep midwicket
slower and fuller on leg-stump, works this to mid-on
gets on top of the bounce and bunt it behind point
skiddy length delivery outside off, Smith taps it down to point

outstanding stop by Rahul at sweeper cover! Absolutely crunched on the up, Rahul runs around 20 yards, and then puts out a swimming pool dive, stops it with one hand and then recovers in a nanosecond to fire a rocket throw. Saved two runs for the side
hoicked from across the line to deep square
beautiful loop from Yuzi! Sharp turn from outside off, dips on Smith as he looks to slog sweep but is beaten
reaches out to drive, hits it down to deep point. He hit that on the up, with the spin
just chipped over Chahal! Looked to turn it wide of midwicket. Lucky break for Khawaja, lack of pace nearly does him in.
steps out to the pitch and eases this to long-off
right into the blockhole, kept out. This drifted in from wide of the crease
slows it down nicely as Smith lunges forward to defend, squirted to short third man. In comes a quick throw, no chance of a single. Excellent over from Chahal
long hop, which he rocks back and pulls to deep midwicket
steps out, Kuldeep tosses this up nicely, he tucks this into the leg side
slider this time on middle, Smith goes right back into the crease to keep that out
can't pick the gap, pulls this straight to square leg
googly which he gets well forward to stab away
drifts away and then spin back in from a length, Smith taps it into the off side as they sprint a single. Top stuff from India's spinners.
length ball, outside off and turning further away. Cut square to deep point for one
full outside leg stump and turning further away from Khawaja as he tries to sweep. Hits the back of Khawaja's bat and then hits Dhoni's helmet, but luckily nobody is hurt
fullish, wide outside off and turning away. Driven to wide extra cover
full outside leg, and he goes for the sweep. Hits it well, but finds short fine leg
full, on leg stump, and nudged off his pads to short fine leg. Enough time to scamper across for one

another Dhoni special! Is Smith run out? This was full outside off, and Smith came down the wicket to whip it away. The shot was inside-edged onto his pads and then rolled towards Dhoni, and the keeper threw the balls at the stumps. But replays show that Smith had managed to bring his bat back in before the bails were dislodged Azhar: 'It's more like a T20 match now.. 198 needed of 20 overs.. Though it's a bit harder for aussies as they ve lost both their openers'
length ball outside off, and cut off the back foot to point
full, on off, and he comes down the wicket to mistimed a slog-type shot to long on
length ball, outside off, and flat-batted to mid-on
length ball outside off, and turning further away. He makes room to cut square, but can't beat the infield
full, on leg stump, and Khawaja walked across his stumps to expose his wickets before slogging over deep backward square for a one-bounce four
full, on off stump, and defended with soft hands
length ball outside off, and turning further away. Cut away to the sweeper-fielder on the off side

tries to reverse sweep but misses. This was full on middle, and Khawaja shaped up to reverse sweep but the ball turned wildly down the leg side, but not called a wide since the batsman changed his grip
swept well! Too much air, too slow on leg, and Khawaja swiftly goes down on one knee to sweep behind square
full, outside off, and sliding away this time. Caressed to long off
length ball, wide outside off and turning further away. Smith stretches to meet the ball, and mistimes a cut to deep point. Drinks
full, just outside off, and turning into Smith. Tapped to the off side
full outside off, and turning further away. But Khawaja is committed to the reverse sweep, and therefore mistimes this shot towards Dhoni
full on middle, and sliding in. Rocks back deep in his crease, and pulls along the ground to the leg side
full, on off, and he nudges it to midwicket for a quick single
full, on off, and he hammers a shot to wide long on. No real timing on this occasion
full outside off, and he caresses a drive through the covers! What good use of the wrists there. Fifty too
back of a length, on leg stump, and he tries to pull but gets cramped up. Goes through to Dhoni. A proper short ball this
length ball, just outside off, and tapped off the back foot to point. They jog across for one
back of a length on leg, but this isn't quick enough. He pulls this in front of square, and this has raced away for four
back of a length on middle, and angling across Khawaja. He misses a flat-batted shot and it goes through to MSD
full, on middle, and he whips this to the leg side, but finds midwicket
length ball outside leg stump, but Khawaja has made room too. So with all stumps exposed, Khawaja tries to Nataraja pull, but he mistimes it to the leg side
full outside off, and turning away. Looks to drive through the covers but beaten by the turn
full outside off, and turning further away, but Khawaja goes down on one knee to slog a six over Bhuvi at wide long on
full, on his toes, and he whips this with the bat's closed face to the leg-side fence
full outside off, and he mistimes a leg-side swipe to midwicket. Dangerous single with Hardik lurking, but he fails to get the direct-hit at the bowler's end
full, on leg stump, and Smith skips down the ground to drive to long off with the bat's open face
full, just outside leg stump, and Khawaja comes down the ground before going inside-out to deep extra cover. Australia go past 200
length ball from outside off but angling in. Guided off the back foot to third man
slower ball wide outside off, and jagging away after hitting the deck. UK can't connect with the attempted cut
length ball, on off, and he tries to muscle a pull. Flat-bats it to mid-on instead
boom boom Bumrah! Khawaja pays the price for trying to be too cute. Full on middle, and Khawaja shuffled across to try and ramp it past Dhoni, but he edges the ball right into his own stumps
length ball outside off, but angling in, and Maxwell gets off the mark with a first-ball four! Punches it past Smith to the long-on fence
full, on off, and he mistimes a cover drive to midwicket instead. Flies off the bat's inside-half
length ball, outside off, and jagging in slightly. Maxwell allows the ball to get to him before crunching a square-cut past point
finesse! Length ball angling in, and Maxwell opens the bat's face to delicately play this fine to the third-man fence
full on leg, and he works it off his pads to deep backward square
length ball, outside off, and the ball generates a bit of a spongy bounce this time. Goes over his bat as he tries to cut
length ball, just outside off, and he pulls this uppishly over tp the fielder at deep backward square
full, on leg stump, and he clips this very very fine past Dhoni's left for another four. Expensive from Bhuvneshwar
stand and deliver! Length ball, just outside off but angling in. Maxwell half-swivels and hammers a front-foot pull to the cow-corner fence. Such great use of the bottom hand to generate that power
back of a length, on off, and pulled to deep backward square. Just a single
length ball just outside off, and Smith attempts to punch, but the ball goes past his outside edge. On the bounce to MSD
nearly clipped the stumps! Slower ball, full just outside off, and Smith tried to slog towards the leg side. But he was through his shot too early, and the inside-edge flew past leg stump

top-edged over MSD! Back of a length ball aimed at Smith's head, but he manages to swipe the bat across his face and find some connect off the wood. Races away for four more. Not too convincing, and Smith even winks at Bumrah after that
yorker, wide outside off, and dug away to point
length ball, on middle, and nudged off his hips to midwicket

length ball, wide outside off, and Maxwell cut this behind square, but Bhuvneshwar is lucky that found Bumrah at short third man. Chance of a run-out at the bowler's end if it was a direct hit, but alas
another length ball, but wide outside off. Maxwell tries to cut, but under-edges the shot

length ball, on middle, but the ball stays low. Smith tries to nudge it to the leg side but misses, and the ball hits his front leg. Huge appeal for lbw, but not given. Kohli says neeche laga hai (ball hit him low) and opts to review. Replays show no inside-edge, and ball-tracking says 'hitting leg stump'. Smith needs to go! Gun review from India.
length ball, just outside off, and punched off the back foot to mid-off
clips his off stump! Length ball, just outside off, but angling in. Ball stays low again, and he misses the attempted front-foot defense. Ball skidding through, and that's two in one over!
spinning into the pads, Maxwell works this googly away through the vacant spaces at square leg
flat and fired on middle and leg, jabbed to the left of Chahal
turn and bounce outside off, Maxwell goes after it - he has to - slashes an outside edge past the right of Dhoni

Chahal gets rid of Maxwell (again). This was pushed through on middle, Maxwell dares to slog-sweep against the break. He is beaten in flight and does not get all of it. He splices a top edge. Jadeja tears in from deep midwicket and completes an excellent tumbling catch. He isn't in the XI today - but is making an impact as sub. Three wickets in seven balls
slower through the air and spins in, inside-edged to the leg side, Chahal himself chases the ball hard, but Carey gets two
reckon that was the googly, Carey throws his hands at it and inside-edges past leg stump

A run-out chance. But the result is 5 runs. Carey backs away and guides this to point, they risk a single. Jadeja swoops down on the ball but misses a direct hit, and KL Rahul lazily fumbles and allows the ball to the boundary
skewed away to the cover-point region
very full on middle, squeezed to mid-off
back of a length and outside off, NCN throws his hands at the ball but does not make contact
short and angling in at off, splices a pull over midwicket does NCN
yorker from wide of the crease, NCN can't touch it. That would have beaten many top-order batsmen as well
googly, turns and bounces outside off, sliced away towards backward point
flatter and on the pads, Carey rolls out the sweep and hits it flat and hard between deep square leg and deep midwicket
shorter and outside off, cracked off the back foot to Rahul at sweeper
tossed outside off. Here comes Carey: down the track and clouts it straight over Chahal's head. Bam
darted flatter and faster on middle, whipped away to deep midwicket
full and spins away outside of, NCN has an almighty swish... and misses
slower ball on middle, backs away and smears it to sweeper cover
slower variation outside off, NCN does not pick it. Swings for the hills... and misses again
slower ball outside off, dragged across the line to deep midwicket
leg-stump yorker, squirted away through square leg
slower ball outside off, barely 115ks, Carey spots it. He baseball-swings it straight of wide long-on
slower short ball on middle, Carey delays his pull and swats it to deep midwicket
full-toss on leg stump from round the stumps, Carey gives himself some room and swishes it away to mid-off
lifter, angling in sharply from round the wicket, Carey ramps it up and over MS Dhoni's head. One-bounce four
pitched up on middle, 141ks, Carey punches to mid-off and tears across to the other end
slower ball outside off, 120ks, NCN is way too early into the slog, so can't touch it

NCN connects with a slower ball now, but can't clear the long boundary. Another 120ks short one wide outside off, NCN drags this offcutter to Kohli at deep midwicket. Kohli gets into a side-on position in the outfield but clings onto the catch
slower ball outside off, Carey steps away and steers to backward point
on a length and wide outside off, Carey reaches out for the ball, loses his shape, and inside-edges it past leg stump
back of a length and zipping through outside off, Cummins aims to run it down to deep third man. Beaten on the outside edge near the shoulder of the bat
Bhuvneshwar hits a hard length on middle, dragged down to long-on
full and wide outside off, looks like an offcutter from Bhuvneshwar. Carey reaches out for the ball and carves it up and over cover-point
yorker on leg stump, squirted down to long-on
slower ball on middle, now it's Cummins' turn to swipe to the leg side and miss the variation
yorker on off, 136ks, Carey makes room and jams it to the covers
back of a length and just a shade outside off, Carey opens the bat-face and guides it away to the left of backward point and right of square third man
off-stump yorker, sliced to sweeper cover for a double
back of a length and angling in at off, hacked away to deep midwicket
middle-stump yorker, Carey clears his front leg and forces the ball down to long-off. 300 up for Australia, but that 353 appears a million miles away
120ks slower offcutter, back of a length and outside off, Cummins swipes early to the leg side and edges it behind. Dhoni dives forward to pouch it
banged in short on middle, Carey takes it on with a hook and bisects deep midwicket and deep square leg
really full on the leg stump, glanced away wide enough of short fine leg for a 25-ball half-century - fastest by an Australian in a World Cup
shortish and angling away outside off, jabbed away to the covers
back of a length on middle, another slower ball, tugged away to wide long-on
slower back of a length ball on leg stump, backs away and muscles to long-on
back of a length and outside off, flicked to wide long-on for a double
Carey steps away outside leg, Bumrah follows him with a ripping yorker and gets it to zip under his bat. He's too good
Carey jumps across off and does not connect with a scoop. Bumrah spears it down leg
120ks slower ball, back of a length and bounces outside off, hard-to-pick variations. Swings and misses
another slower one outside off, offcutter, keeps low and spins past Dhoni after Carey misses again
back of a length and cuts away outside off again, Ctrl + C. Ctrl +V. Carey can't touch these
length ball on leg stump, pumped over Bumrah's head. Just 1 run off the bat in the 49th over a chase of 353. Bumrah, you beauty

touch too full on middle, Carey opens the face and slices to sweeper cover. Carey and Starc chance a second. Vijay Shankar (the sub) throws it to Bhuvneshwar at the non-striker's end. Starc is caught short. Australia nine down
knuckle ball, keeps low, nurdled away to the leg side
back of a length, snakes back in and chops Zampa into half. Past the inside edge
full and outside off, slices a drive to the left of Chahal at point
full and wide - possibly wider than a set of stumps outside off, Carey reaches out and carves to long-off
Bhuvneshwar closes out the game with his knuckle-ball variation. Back of a length on middle, Zampa splices it to mid-off. That is that
